file_content.text: No new murders, and that bounty hunter seems to have disappeared. I knew I was right about him!
The murderer's name is Renegin. He's hiding in the Mandalorian enclave. Go look if you don't believe me!
Seven brutal, bloody murders. Seven! And the killer is allowed to walk free?
Decent, law-abiding citizens--loyal servants of the Emperor--are being slaughtered. And what do our security forces do? Nothing!
I've seen the killer myself, but the authorities say I don't have enough proof. I demand justice!
Why are you yelling at me?
Calm down!
I apologize for raising my voice, my lord. But these murders cannot go unpunished--not when the killer is so obvious.
You haven't heard about the horrible murders? Ghastly crimes--and I know who committed them.
Because you probably know the killer. He's a professional manhunter, like you! Well, hopefully not just like you....
I must be heard. I'm the only one who knows the truth!
Well, I'm--I'm not fit to confront such an individual. But someone has to!
Several days ago, I spotted a bounty hunter following people seemingly at random--but pointing a strange device at them.
The descriptions of the murder victims exactly match the people the hunter was following. He's behind these brutal killings--I know it.
Only a coward kills defenseless people from the shadows.
He sounds like scum.
And only a brave guardian like you can bring that coward to justice, my lord.
I admire any killer who leaves so faint a trail.
How interesting....
Ah, but he didn't elude detection, my lord, I saw him--and now I'll make certain everyone knows his name.
Bounty hunters--so unsubtle. A real professional wouldn't be detected.
What an obvious fool.
And he never saw me watching him. He must think he's invincible.
Lots of bounty hunters kill for a living. Me, for instance.
Maybe it's just a job?
There's nothing professional about these murders. They're sickening--depraved, even.
Well, what a relief. I've been trying to get someone--anyone--to listen to me for days.
No. I know what I saw. I--I made no mistakes, I'm sure of it.
I followed the killer this morning. Saw him skulking into the Mandalorian enclave. Someone called him by name--Renegin.
I followed the killer this morning. Saw the filthy alien skulking into the Mandalorian enclave. Someone called him by name--Renegin.
This bounty hunter must learn the Empire doesn't tolerate gutter scum like him killing its citizens. He needs to be punished!
This bounty hunter must learn the Empire doesn't tolerate alien scum like him killing its citizens. He needs to be punished!
Please excuse me. I'm waiting to speak with a security commander.
Obsess much?
You certainly are loud.
From me?
Then let's punish him.
Your evidence is thin.
